Our Services

Consultancy

We help businesses and individuals in developing business strategies as a way of creating value for businesses. This includes advising and devising methods for businesses that would optimize both business opportunities and costs to improve business performance while leveraging on existing data.

View More

Analytics and Business Intelligence(BI)

We help businesses with information on market intelligence where businesses get to know who their market is and as well as provide businesses with advice on customer discovery, retention, and maturation. As part of BI, LAPO Solutions Ltd assists businesses with data modeling so that they are able to discover useful information for business operations, which in turn will lead to revenue growth while reducing operation costs and risks.

View More

Data Camps/Boot Camps

LAPO Solutions offers 6-months of extensive data training courses targeted to high school and college students to gain good data analysis skills. This is both online and in-person learning, where course training will be but not limited to Excel, Python, R, Power BI, and Tableau. Students participating in this program can expect to gain knowledge in data analysis tools to help them meet the modern working environment and help businesses solve real-world problems.

View More

Financial & Investment Advisory Services

The company provides business, corporate , and individual financial advisory on how to manage money and make informed decisions so that they are able to meet their financial goals. LAPO Solutions Ltd also helps businesses utilize data and relevant information to understand how to achieve project objectives effectively.

View More

About us

We are passionate about building a consortium of allies, including entrepreneurs, experts, advisors, investors, and professionals, who collectively advance Good Businesses by leveraging the latest technologies and data analytics. With a wide range of skills, our team includes both locals and internationals who have worked in different fields including, but not limited to, Data Analytics, Financial and Investment Advisory Services, Education and Teaching, Consulting, Project Evaluations, Research, and Technology, among others
